title: Is it actually a bad thing for the Pixel Watch to use proprietary bands?
content:
The first major leak of the Pixel Watch has arrived and with it, the confirmation that Google is ditching reliance on the old pin system for smartwatch bands. The Pixel Watch will have a proprietary band, and that’s not necessarily a bad thing.

more…

The post Is it actually a bad thing for the Pixel Watch to use proprietary bands? appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Google's Pixel Watch has leaked and shown off its proprietary watch bands, but we're confident that's not a bad thing. Here's why.
